Dialogue: What a display, what a traversal! You did so well to get here
You were wise not to pity these souls. They were already destroying themselves. All it took was a little push.
You understand the necessity of this. Better to have no life than whatever shell of a life they were living.
ENOUGH OF THAT NONSENSE! I will be the God of this world and it is all thanks to you! Oh I'm so excited! I CAN HARDLY STAND IT!
LET ME DEVOUR YOU! I WILL DEVOUR EVERYTHING! I AM A GOD! I WILL BE THE GOD OF THE NEW WORLD!
